metadata.title: CVE-2021-30585 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in sensor handling in Google Chrome on Windows prior to92.0.4515.107 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
